DOC.detailed_description: Patients diagnose obstructive coronary artery disease treat DES FFR examination would enrol , consecutively . FFR measurement would require baseline end index PCI procedure . PCI procedure would perform upon local routine . Any available DES could use . Informed consent obtain protocol approve collaborator 's institutional review board ( IRB ) . Web-based electronic-case record form ( CRF ) system use collect data . All data handle analyzed blind fashion independent core lab . Patient followed-up collaborator 's hospital least 2 year index procedure . Any adverse event report addressed immediately appropriate medical treatment protect patient .
